data.description: Get win32 Process's command line parameter
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a good example for who wants to write Perl extension
    in C. It took a while to figure out how to use h2xs and generated
    files. I put details in README file. And the module introduces UTF16
    and bunch of win32 APIs.
